name: A Tale of Swords and Spears
name_original: A Tale of Swords and Spears
description: A Tale of Swords and Spears is an action adventure game in which you play as the main hero Agi, a knight of the Sword Kingdom, who is sent to retrieve the relic Brandur, the sword forged by the First King, which has been stolen by the southern Kingdom of Spears as an act of war.  On her quest, she is constantly met by soldiers of the Kingdom of Spears sent to protect their kingdom from whoever desires to return the sword.  It is a story of adventure, discovery and treachery as the player works to complete the ultimate goal of acquiring Brandur.
